attributes.action: instruct whichever body reads and responds to these petitions to ignore any which are hostile to any rights for individuals if the signatories are not personally affected by the issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The trigger for this petition was seeing a VERY anti-choice petition on abortion; a very high percentage of signatories were men who, by the very nature of things, can't be affected by an unwanted pregnancy except vicariously.  Why should these men, who will never have to experience the extreme agony of labour, have the right to sign a petition which would force unwilling women to experience it?  And although that was the issue which spurred me to create this petition I'm sure there are many others to which the same stance could apply.
